short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See which Perch ASINs are on amazon pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thank you for being one of the first users of our new Chrome browser extension, The Perchandiser!

With over 40 brands and over 30,000 Amazon listings, we know that it can be difficult to know exactly what we sell, or which products of ours might be a good fit for articles, roundups, videos, posts, and gift guides that you’re working on. Previously, you would have to check our massive ASIN list, or browse our Affiliate Product Database to find products to feature. Now you won’t even have to leave Amazon.com.

When a Perch product appears anywhere on an Amazon page on your browser, whether in search results pages, or even in the Related Products section on a competitor’s product page, the Perchandiser will alert you and show you where to find our commission-eligible listings.
